title: Bloomingdale's: Romance Everlasting
description: Outdoor scene in  c.18th century style. Recto: Four acrobats performing on stage in front of orange swag curtain; green trees and sky in background; row of heads of audience members in front. Verso: Acrobat on tightrope; clown and performing dog below. Side panels: Vertical design of jugglers. Base: "Lexington".
name: Shopping bag
